docs.abstract: Tennessee’s football program has improved its academic progress to the point that it will not face punishment from the NCAA; program had a four-year total of 932 in the Academic Progress Rate, just above the 930 minimum needed.

docs.snippet: The relationship between Brazilian fans and their football teams transcends sports. It's loyalty by history, by blood. It's an association that passes from generation to generation. The son of a Flamengo fan will be a Flamengo fan. And you can bet...
docs.lead_paragraph: The relationship between Brazilian fans and their football teams transcends sports. It's loyalty by history, by blood. It's an association that passes from generation to generation. The son of a Flamengo fan will be a Flamengo fan. And you can bet his son will be a Flamengo fan too.

headline.main: AP Photos: Football Like a Religion for Brazilians

docs.abstract: Profile of Dean Baquet, who has replaced The New York Times Executive Editor Jill Abramson; Baquet takes over the paper at a time of upheaval and uncertainty in the news business.

headline.main: Newspapers Hooked Dean Baquet, New Editor of The Times, at an Early Age

docs.abstract: Advertising column; presentations made by CBS and cable channels TBS and TNT show contrasting strategies for coming television season; CBS and TBS are sticking to show choices that had resonated with viewers and TNT is choosing to shake-up its offerings.
